title: Runway Growth Finance Corp. Reports First Quarter 2022 Financial Results - Yahoo Finance
content: Runway Growth Finance Corp. Reports First Quarter 2022 Financial Results  Yahoo Finance
description: Achieves Record Total and Net Investment Income of $19.3 and $12.5 Million, Respectively Increases Core Leverage Ratio of Portfolio to 26.1% Grows Investment Portfolio to Record $754.3 Million Conference Call Today, Thursday, May 5 at 6:00 p.m. ET WOODSIDE, Calif., May 05, 2022 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Runway Growth Finance Corp. (Nasdaq: RWAY) (“Runway Growth” or the “Company”), a leading provider of flexible capital solutions to late and growth-stage companies seeking an alternative to raising equi
